#summary lighttpd伺服器設定

= rewrite的設定 =
{{{
url.rewrite-once = (
  ".*\.(js|ico|gif|jpg|png|css|txt|swf|mp3)$" => "$0",
  ".*\?(.*)$" => "/index.php?$1",
  "" => "/index.php"
)
}}}

= mod_expire的設定 =
== 設定此選項可以減輕網站負擔 ==
{{{
$HTTP["url"] =~ "^/template/" {
         expire.url = ( "" => "access 10 years" )
}
}}}
